committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize the immediate retirement without reduction in annuity of employees and Members of Congress upon completion of 30 years of service.

summary.text: Authorizes the immediate retirement without reduction in annuity of Federal employees and Members of Congress upon completion of thirty years of service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336(a), 8336(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize the immediate retirement without reduction in annuity of employees and Members of Congress upon completion of 30 years of service.
